body:
Tim, a space must be a part of a single thermal zone. You can have multiple spaces in single thermal zone and "share" light among them with the air-wall construction, but OpenStudio does not currently "roll up" multiple spaces' loads and schedules into a single load schedule for the zone. A major limitation, I know.
